# NSTextAlignment.natural

**Case**

Text uses the default alignment for the current localization of the app.

## Declaration

```swift
case natural
```

## Discussion

The default alignment for left-to-right scripts is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextAlignment/left], and the default alignment for right-to-left scripts is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextAlignment/right].

## Constants

- **NSTextAlignment.left**: Text is left-aligned.
- **NSTextAlignment.right**: Text is right-aligned.
- **NSTextAlignment.center**: Text is center-aligned.
- **NSTextAlignment.justified**: Text is justified.
title: NSTextAlignment.natural
